meta.job_title: Senior Counsel, Deputy Chief Privacy Officer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Build & improve the company's global privacy compliance initiatives, centered on GDPR, HIPAA, and U.S. consumer privacy laws.
Undertake a comprehensive review of the company's existing data privacy policies, processes, and procedures to ensure compliance with relevant data privacy laws and regulations.
Advise Senior Management and operational employees of their obligations to comply with the GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA, and other data privacy laws.
Develop, manage, and assist in the implementation and maintenance of the company's privacy policies and procedures.
Conduct privacy impact assessments of proposed services or products.
Develop, implement, and train company personnel on the company's Incident Response Plan.
Administer action on all complaints concerning the organization's privacy policies and procedures.
Demonstrate a commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion through continuous development, modeling inclusive behaviors, and proactively managing bias.

education_certification.credential: Active law license in at least one of the 50 U.S. states and/or the District of Columbia
At least one International Association of Privacy Professionals (IAPP) certification (CIPP/US, CIPP/E, etc.)
